title: ECHS Recruitment 2026 - Apply Offline for 09 Medical Officer, Dental Officer and Other Posts
description: Ex-Servicemen Contributory Health Scheme (ECHS Hisar) has declared the official notification for 2026. To fill up the 09 vacancies for Medical Officer, Dental Officer, Pharmacist, Nursing Assistant, and Other Jobs. Those candidates who have completed their Any Degree, MBBS, BDS, DMLT, B.Pharm, D.Pharm, GNM, Diploma, 08th can grab this chance and apply for the ECHS Recruitment 2026 . Here we included the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and ho...
